channel.title: Mistex | Amazing Economy | Loads of Content | Updated Daily | 24/7
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/qHLcCpf.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/NQ2p2S5.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/vWsFPx2.png[/img] Mistex is a server that is inspired and driven by you, the members of Mistex. We listen to what the players want, we want everyone to feel like Mistex is a server where they truly belong. The game play is not only fresh it is extremely fluid and highly customizable. We carefully selected the best features of each different revision and put them all into one perfect server. The content of Mistex is outstanding, there are features that no other servers can replicate. Mistex has an outstanding set of developers that are not only professional and educated but dedicated. The features of Mistex are endless, however these are a few 'key' features: [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/vcLMWo1.png[/img] * Amazing Combat (Correct data, formula, configurations) * Perfect item switching * Bank tabs w/ searching * All skills work perfectly * Skill orbs * Skill goals * Amazing economy setup * Stable, no lag with 99.9% uptime * Beautiful Fullscreen/Resizeable/Fixed Game Modes * Amazing Achievement System (Progress,Interfaces,Tab) * Unique Player Profiler System * Togglable gameplay * Breathtaking Client * Fun Statue Minigame * Loyalty Titles * Tweening * TriviaBot * Fast loading * Small cache size * Forum Highscores * Highscores (Shows top 50 Pkers) * XP Counter * 562 Gameframe * All Specials work flawlessly! * Kill streak System * Dicing! * Loads more!
What are you waiting for? Join now and begin your adventure! [url=http://www.mistex.org]http://www.mistex.org[/url]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/1FSBLLa.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/0qeTp53.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/6QsQHDl.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/5VDeiH2.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/1HLZwZl.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/g7oSTdA.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/bcc1Lhy.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/TbcNaKr.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/vLSVRhF.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/quVv6rk.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Jbp8EBY.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/0PfPnAG.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/GYYAvmn.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ETT95Yr.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/FPiXJPM.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/f63LVPj.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/dmfTvDK.png[/img]
WHAT ARE YOU WAITING FOR? JOIN NOW! [URL=http://www.mistex.org]http://www.mistex.org[/URL] YOU WON'T BE DISAPPOINTED, NEWEST AND BEST SERVER OUT THERE! PERFECT ECONOMY! [/center]

item.title: Mistex | Amazing Economy | Loads of Content | Updated Daily | 24/7
item.dc:creator: @SESH SESH
item.description:
@SESH wrote:

[center]


Mistex is a server that is inspired and driven by you, the members of Mistex. We listen to what the players want, we want everyone to feel like Mistex is a server where they truly belong. The game play is not only fresh it is extremely fluid and highly customizable. We carefully selected the best features of each different revision and put them all into one perfect server. The content of Mistex is outstanding, there are features that no other servers can replicate. Mistex has an outstanding set of developers that are not only professional and educated but dedicated. The features of Mistex are endless, however these are a few ‘key’ features:

  • Amazing Combat (Correct data, formula, configurations)
  • Perfect item switching
  • Bank tabs w/ searching
  • All skills work perfectly
  • Skill orbs
  • Skill goals
  • Amazing economy setup
  • Stable, no lag with 99.9% uptime
  • Beautiful Fullscreen/Resizeable/Fixed Game Modes
  • Amazing Achievement System (Progress,Interfaces,Tab)
  • Unique Player Profiler System
  • Togglable gameplay
  • Breathtaking Client
  • Fun Statue Minigame
  • Loyalty Titles
  • Tweening
  • TriviaBot
  • Fast loading
  • Small cache size
  • Forum Highscores
  • Highscores (Shows top 50 Pkers)
  • XP Counter
  • 562 Gameframe
  • All Specials work flawlessly!
  • Kill streak System
  • Dicing!
  • Loads more!

What are you waiting for? Join now and begin your adventure!
http://www.mistex.org

















WHAT ARE YOU WAITING FOR? JOIN NOW!
[URL=http://www.mistex.org]http://www.mistex.org[/URL]
YOU WON’T BE DISAPPOINTED, NEWEST AND BEST SERVER OUT THERE! PERFECT ECONOMY!
[/center]
